## Token class

Standard token or cryptocurrency.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Token
```

## Example

```jsx
import { Web3sdksSDK } from "@web3sdks/sdk/solana";

const sdk = Web3sdksSDK.fromNetwork("devnet");
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Get the interface for your token program
const program = await sdk.getProgram("{{program_address}}", "token");
```

## Constructors

| Constructor                                                                    | Modifiers | Description                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| [(constructor)(tokenAddress, metaplex, storage)](./sdk.token._constructor_.md) |           | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Token</code> class |

## Properties

| Property                                  | Modifiers             | Type                                      | Description |
| ----------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| [accountType](./sdk.token.accounttype.md) |                       | "token"                                   |             |
| [network](./sdk.token.network.md)         | <code>readonly</code> | import("@metaplex-foundation/js").Cluster |             |
| [publicKey](./sdk.token.publickey.md)     |                       | PublicKey                                 |             |

## Methods

| Method                                                       | Modifiers | Description                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [balance()](./sdk.token.balance.md)                          |           | Get the token balance of the connected wallet                             |
| [balanceOf(walletAddress)](./sdk.token.balanceof.md)         |           | Get the token balance of the specified wallet                             |
| [getMetadata()](./sdk.token.getmetadata.md)                  |           | Get the metadata for this token including the name, supply, and decimals. |
| [mint(amount)](./sdk.token.mint.md)                          |           | Mints the specified amount of new tokens to the connected wallet          |
| [mintTo(receiverAddress, amount)](./sdk.token.mintto.md)     |           | Mints the specified amount of new tokens to a specific wallet             |
| [totalSupply()](./sdk.token.totalsupply.md)                  |           | Get the total minted supply of this token                                 |
| [transfer(receiverAddress, amount)](./sdk.token.transfer.md) |           | Transfer the specified amount of tokens to another wallet                 |
